overview: Hernán begins a new day, and things don't seem to be going well for him from the moment he opens his eyes. He will discover what is the truth behind those incidents in the mouth of Emiliano, his best friend, who knows perfectly well what the solution is: we must avenge El Gallego.
tagline: Revenge is a dish that is served cold... They served it hot
title: Vengar al Gallego
